name: Darth Vader & Stormtroopers
author: Gemini
description: The Emperor's wrathful enforcer, Darth Vader, leads his relentless Stormtroopers to crush the Rebellion with overwhelming power and tactical precision.

cards.name: ğŸ”¹ Force Choke
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to an enemy in your line of sight; that enemy must discard one random card.

cards.name: ğŸ”¹ Vader's Fury
cards.rulesText: Gain Focused for your next attack this turn, adding +2 to its damage.

cards.name: ğŸ”¸ You Are In Command Now
cards.rulesText: You may defeat a friendly Stormtrooper to draw 2 cards and gain 1 action.

cards.name: ğŸ”¸ Imperial Advance
cards.rulesText: Choose up to two friendly Stormtroopers and move each of them up to 3 spaces.

cards.name: ğŸ”º Telekinetic Throw
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to one enemy and you may push or pull them up to 2 spaces.

cards.name: ğŸ”º Your Feelings Betray You
cards.rulesText: Look at an opponent's hand and choose one card for them to discard.

cards.name: â—† I Have You Now
cards.rulesText: Deal 5 damage to one enemy in your line of sight; this damage cannot be defended.

cards.name: ğŸŸ¢ Covering Fire
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to an enemy in your line of sight.

cards.name: ğŸŸ¢ Squad Tactics
cards.rulesText: Choose another friendly Stormtrooper, who may immediately move up to 3 spaces.

cards.name: ğŸŸ¡ E-11 Blast
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to up to two different enemies in your line of sight.

cards.name: ğŸŸ¡ Targeting Computer
cards.rulesText: This Stormtrooper gains Empowered until the end of the turn (+1 to all attacks).

cards.name: ğŸŸ£ Reinforcements
cards.rulesText: If there are fewer than 3 Stormtroopers on the board, place one defeated Stormtrooper with full health adjacent to Darth Vader.

cards.name: ğŸŸ£ For the Empire!
cards.rulesText: This Stormtrooper may move up to 4 spaces.

cards.name: â­ Dark Side Presence
cards.rulesText: Push all adjacent enemies 1 space away from you and deal 1 damage to each of them.
